title: The USGS Now Uses Your Panicked Tweets to Help Track Earthquakes
text:
The USGS Now Uses Your Panicked Tweets to Help Track Earthquakes 
Published By: Gizmodo.com - Today 
People who live in seismically active areas are so good about posting earthquake tweets that you may even be warned of a quake via Twitter b...
